title: My Google Pixel 3 XL won't connect to Wifi, I've tried resetting it and clearing cach
content: Ive tried resetting my wifi cache and resetting my phone. The wifi also doesn't turn on when I go to Safe Mode so it can't be an app. I press the wifi button and it blues up then automatically Grey's out again without even connecting to anything it just turns off right away.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
